For purposes of convenience, the Code of Ethics applies to the male, but all that is said therein refers to women and men alike.
The use of the application on its contents and services provided to you is subject to your acceptance of all the terms contained in these regulations.
Your use of the Application and / or subscription to its services shall be deemed to be your agreement to these terms.
The management of the application may suspend, block or stop the surfer\'s access to the service immediately if he violates the terms of the regulations.
The management of the application may update the terms and conditions from time to time.
The use of the application shall not be used for illegal purposes.
The application is intended only for students of the Sami Shamoon College. On your login you declare that you are a full-time student at the Sami Shamoon College.

The application may not be performed without the userâ€™s consent and / or without his presence in front of the screen at the time of use and after all the terms of these regulations have been explained to him.

The use of the application is for personal use only and the user is not authorized to transfer the user\'s permission to another person. A special obligation to be precise in all the personal details required for registration and for the ongoing contact with the subscriber.
Any information that is false, insulting, defamatory, threatening, infringing on the privacy of others, pornographic, sexual, racist, or unlawful may not be published or transmitted through the app.

You are solely responsible for the accuracy of the information you publish or transmit through the application. The management of the application does not accept any responsibility for the content published or transmitted among subscribers.
The application may not be used commercially by way of advertising a service or a product.

All votes you have made are at your own risk and you are aware that the management of the application will not modify / delete any details. It is highly recommended to carefully consider and verify the details, as well as to take maximum precautions before making the vote.

The application management intends that the application and its services will be available always. At the same time, the application management is unable to commit to continuous availability without any mishaps and without "falls". In addition, the application\'s management is entitled to discontinue use of the application from time to time for its maintenance and organization. No monetary compensation will be granted due to malfunctions or breaks in service.
All intellectual property rights and copyrights in connection with the Application are those of the Application\'s management.
The management of the application is not responsible for the content of ads, "banners" or any advertising material in the application. Advertisers are solely responsible for this.
The existence of links ("links") to other sites does not guarantee the contents of these sites in terms of their reliability, completeness, or in any other manner.
The regulations shall apply to Israeli law. Jurisdiction over it to the competent courts in Tel Aviv / Beer Sheva.
